title: Beware the Nameless
description: The New York Times best-selling series continues with this compelling and fast-paced adventure set during the High Republic that picks up after Escape from Valo .It is a dark and dangerous time for the galaxy, and the Jedi of the High Republic must face their greatest trials yet. A year has passed since the destruction of the Starlight Beacon, and hopeful Jedi-in-training must work together to overcome their fears—and stop the monsters that threaten the very existence of the Jedi.
author: Zoraida Córdova
